title: [GAMEPLAY] Hearthseeker Lucian skin bug on Summoners Rift (with video)
body:
After i died for the sixth time on normals, i got this visual bug that only i can saw. (i was playing with my friends and i did ask them did they see, they said no)
Seems like my character was inside the map on the base, and on fountain i saw nothing.
I was only experiencing this bug with this new skin only, and after patch 7.3.
If u check the [video](http://plays.tv/video/589bcfd8c21e8734e7/hearthseeker-lucian-skin-bug-with-map) u can see it aswell.

cheers

replies.body: Hey! Thanks for the report! I've seen this occur with other champions, so it shouldn't be a skin-specific issue. Lemme follow up with our map team friends and see if they're aware of it/digging into the issue!
